Education (CODE) and the
Student Association are

contributions of $110 per
month, CODE is renovating a
house at 2800 Remington•

makes available information
on legal, medical and
psychiatric aspects of drug
abuse.

now being set up. People with
severe disturbances can be
counselled in a quiet atmosphere at the house.

funds come in.

structure is now without

two bathrooms. A large back
room is being equipped with

refrigerators, and will be

rooms and a kitchen.
